dc_description_s: based on the surveys executed by order of the honourable the East India Company, special maps of the surveyor general and other authorities, showing the latest territorial acquisitions of the British Empire, and the independent and protected states, railways, canals, &c.; Scale approximately 1:2,200,000. Relief shown by hachures. Originally folded to 21 x 15 cm. Includes 4 insets: The Malay Peninsula &c. showing British possessions beyond the Ganges -- Distances and bearings from Bombay -- Distances and bearings from Madras -- Distances and bearings from Calcutta. 84 x 130 cm
